s.text: He says the obstruction of justice charge is still volatile, and that she, by being convincing one way or the other, can prevent the proceedings from being decided on something other than a party-line vote.
The article begins with a pointed reference to Hillary Clinton's charge that a "vast right-wing conspiracy" has Bill Clinton in its sights.
